pkgmetadata.longdescription: Credit Default Swaps in R // Provides tools for pricing credit default swaps using C code for the International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA) CDS Standard Model. See http://www.cdsmodel.com/cdsmodel/documentation.html for more information about the model and http://www.cdsmodel.com/cdsmodel/cds-disclaimer.html for license details for the C code.
